info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 06 at 6:30PM EDT until April 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN LUNENBURG...NOTTOWAY AND CENTRAL AMELIA COUNTIES... At 629 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Scotts Fork to Spainville to near Blackstone, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Scotts Fork, Spainville and Chula around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include North Wellville, Irby, Arvins Store, Earls, Murdocks, Nutbush, The Falls, Winterham, Maplewood and Dominy Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
